def encrypt(text, rule):
    return "".join(chr((ord(i)+rule)%256) for i in text)

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return "".join(chr((ord(c) + rule) % 256) for c in text)

def encrypt(text, key):
    return "".join(chr((ord(ch) + key) & 255) for ch in text)

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return ''.join(chr((ord(c) + rule) & 255) for c in text)

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return ''.join([chr((ord(a) + rule) % 256) for a in text])

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return "".join(chr((ord(x) + rule)%256) for x in text)

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return ''.join([chr((ord(s) + rule) % 256) for s in text])

def encrypt(text, rule):
    return ''.join(map(lambda x: chr((ord(x)+rule)%256), text))
